title: Conjure Barrage
content:
Conjure Barrage Level 3 Conjuration Spell Weapon Damage 2d8Slashing Channel your weapon's essence into a destructive, widespread volley. On Save: Targets still take half damage. 9m DEX Save Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Conjuration Spell

Channel your weapon's essence into a destructive, widespread volley.

On Save: Targets still take half damage.

Conjure Barrage is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Conjure Barrage is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Conjure Barrage Information

Description: Channel your weapon's essence into a destructive, widespread volley. On Save: Targets still take half damage. Level: Lvl 3 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Cone Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save
